p: Other clone-derived, rationally attenuated CHIKF vaccine candidates include strains with deletions of a large part of the nonstructural protein 3 (nsP3) gene or the entire 6K/TF gene [ 38]. These vaccines, either administered as viral particles or infectious genomes launched from DNA, are highly immunogenic and efficacious in mice [ 38]. The nsP3 deletion vaccine, Î”5nsP3 (VLA1553), is now in the recruitment stage for a Phase 1 clinical trial ( Table 1).
